DOC.detailed_description: This project involve interdisciplinary stroke database demographic variable clinical measure collect routine acute care , inpatient rehabilitation admission discharge well follow questionnaire 6 month 12 month examine stroke recovery . Our aim observe describe relationship impairment function , systematically characterize recovery pattern examine short long term rehabilitation outcomes . This project purely observational , descriptive non experimental . No rehabilitation intervention treatment procedure introduce , modify study .
DOC.criteria: Patients confirm primary diagnosis cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) per radiological assessment , meet criterion admit onto Baker 17 ( New York Presbyterian inpatient rehabilitation unit ) , administer standardized assessment rating scale part routine standard care include database . Persons stroke could give standard assessment rating scale ( eg . due fatigue , decrease attention span , global aphasia refusal ) include data analysis .
